text.title: Former Scottish Conservatives leader Annabel Goldie to stand down as MSP
text.head: Former Scottish Conservatives leader Annabel Goldie to stand down as MSP
Sources

list.item: "Tributes as former Scottish Conservative leader announces she will stand down" — Scottish Conservative Party , June 25, 2015
"Annabel Goldie: Former Scottish Tory leader to retire next year" — STV News , June 25, 2015
